Hero.title: Hi, I'm Igor!
Hero.text-1-4: creating, developing and improving not only software

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: Get to know me!
About.text-1: So..., as you already know my name is Igor ðŸ˜…. I graduated in Computer Engineering with a bachelor degree from the University of Zielona GÃ³ra. Since then, I have been working and improving my skills in different sections of IT.
About.text-2: I have work experience in web development, software testing and graphics design. Currently I spend most of the time on creating front-end applications for differen companies and on improving my skills and learning new technologies.
About.text-3: I pay attention to detail and I always try to do my job the best I can. I prefere learning-by-doing theory. I'm responsible and precise. I like to have a real impact on the projects that I work on. I'm always open to new opportunities and experiences.
About.text-4: Currently I'm looking for a job with the tech stack that I like the most. I care about getting experience and creating interesting projects. I will be happy to work as a front-end or full-stack developer. I'm ready to relocate if needed.

Work.title: Work
Work.description-1: I've created this app for myself as my portfolio website. I used Next.Js with App Router, Zustand for state management and Tailwind. I also used some fancy libraries like next-themes, next-intl, resend, create-email, use-sound, useMediaQuery from usehooks-ts and Framer Motion
Work.description-2: This App is my take on a web service with Ai tools. The app uses the public but limited free version of OpenAi API and Replicate API to generate: text, code, image, music and video. The app offers a free tier where the users are allowed to generate 5 different items. The users also have an option to upgrade to a pro version of the app which allows them to generate an unlimited amount of items
Work.description-3: My goal for this app was to create a front-end copy of the YouTube application. I was trying to achieve not only the same look but also to re-create the behavior of website and its individual components. It was my first time using Next.js with the App Router which was still in beta at that moment. The App Router functionality changes a lot and I wanted to learn it and understand it as soon as possible
